description: Deploy a paste-or-upload single-page app to IBM Cloud Object Storage with one click. Built for vibe coding.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.description: Where your vibe lives organizationally. If unsure, 'default' is fine.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region for your Object Storage bucket. 'us-south' is a steady classic.

variables.name: cos_instance_name
variables.description: Optional: name for your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance. Leave blank to auto-generate.

variables.name: bucket_name
variables.description: Optional: bucket name (lowercase, no spaces). Leave blank to auto-generate.

variables.name: index_html
variables.description: Paste your full HTML here — it becomes your app’s index.html when deployed. Leave blank to use the sample app.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_url
outputs.description: Direct link to your bucket (listing URL).
